Text:
Thanks for this book.  Another overlooked weapon is the slingshot.

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/4341285/SLINGSHOT_SHOOTING

your welcome hrmitcrb and thank you for pointing out the slingshot book. i will try to convert it, ASAP.

I agree with you that both these weapons are very much overlooked but in the hands of someone who is skilled enough these can become deadly.
